text: Appignanesi in 2014 Ennio Appignanesi (18 June 1925 - 26 March 2015) was an Italian Roman Catholic archbishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1950, Appignanesi became auxiliary bishop of the diocese of Lucera and eventually was named archbishop of Potenza-Muro-Lucano-Marsico Nuevo, Italy in 1993 and retired in 2001.Ennio Appignanesi ==Notes== Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Ennio Appignanesi
